  labels = {["static"]}>

### runFixI1Copies() {#a7cf6d1c87b479dd800293a9194aaff9a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static bool runFixI1Copies (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; MF, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinedominatortree">MachineDominatorTree</a> &amp; MDT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinepostdominatortree">MachinePostDominatorTree</a> &amp; MPDT)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Lower all instructions that def or use vreg&#95;1 registers.

In a first pass, we lower COPYs from vreg&#95;1 to vector registers, as can occur around inline assembly. We do this first, before vreg&#95;1 registers are changed to scalar mask registers.

Then we lower all defs of vreg&#95;1 registers. Phi nodes are lowered before all others, because phi lowering looks through copies and can therefore often make copy lowering unnecessary.

Definition at line <a href="#l00866">866</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/siloweri1copies-cpp">SILowerI1Copies.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This pass lowers all occurrences of i1 values (with a vreg&#95;1 register class)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to lane masks (32 / 64-bit scalar registers). The pass assumes machine SSA</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// form and a wave-level control flow graph.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Before this pass, values that are semantically i1 and are defined and used</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// within the same basic block are already represented as lane masks in scalar</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// registers. However, values that cross basic blocks are always transferred</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// between basic blocks in vreg&#95;1 virtual registers and are lowered by this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// pass.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The only instructions that use or define vreg&#95;1 virtual registers are COPY,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// PHI, and IMPLICIT&#95;DEF.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Helper class that determines the relationship between incoming values of a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="comment">/// phi in the control flow graph to determine where an incoming value can</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="comment">/// simply be taken as a scalar lane mask as-is, and where it needs to be</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="comment">/// merged with another, previously defined lane mask.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The approach is as follows:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="comment">///  - Determine all basic blocks which, starting from the incoming blocks,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="comment">///    a wave may reach before entering the def block (the block containing the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="comment">///    phi).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="comment">///  - If an incoming block has no predecessors in this set, we can take the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="comment">///    incoming value as a scalar lane mask as-is.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="comment">///  -- A special case of this is when the def block has a self-loop.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="comment">///  - Otherwise, the incoming value needs to be merged with a previously</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="comment">///    defined lane mask.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="comment">///  - If there is a path into the set of reachable blocks that does &#95;not&#95; go</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="comment">///    through an incoming block where we can take the scalar lane mask as-is,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="comment">///    we need to invent an available value for the SSAUpdater. Choices are</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="comment">///    0 and undef, with differing consequences for how to merge values etc.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="comment">/// TODO: We could use region analysis to quickly skip over SESE regions during</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="comment">///       the traversal.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-siloweri1copies-cpp-/phiincominganalysis"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-siloweri1copies-cpp-/phiincominganalysis/#abb21aa4a6197f05bf7b9184f7a44378a">PhiIncomingAnalysis</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinepostdominatortree">MachinePostDominatorTree</a> &amp;PDT;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/siinstrinfo">SIInstrInfo</a> &#42;TII;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For each reachable basic block, whether it is a source in the induced</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// subgraph of the CFG.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;MachineBasicBlock &#42;, bool&gt;</a> ReachableMap;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;MachineBasicBlock &#42;, 4&gt;</a> ReachableOrdered;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;MachineBasicBlock &#42;, 4&gt;</a> Predecessors;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a> = Stack.pop&#95;back&#95;val();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Helper class that detects loops which require us to lower an i1 COPY into</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="comment">/// bitwise manipulation.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Unfortunately, we cannot use LoopInfo because LoopInfo does not distinguish</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="comment">/// between loops with the same header. Consider this example:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="comment">///  A-+-+</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="comment">///  | | |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="comment">///  B-+ |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="comment">///  |   |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="comment">///  C---+</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="comment">/// A is the header of a loop containing A, B, and C as far as LoopInfo is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="comment">/// concerned. However, an i1 COPY in B that is used in C must be lowered to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="comment">/// bitwise operations to combine results from different loop iterations when</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><Highlight kind="comment">/// B has a divergent branch (since by default we will compile this code such</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><Highlight kind="comment">/// that threads in a wave are merged at the entry of C).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The following rule is implemented to determine whether bitwise operations</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="comment">/// are required: use the bitwise lowering for a def in block B if a backward</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="comment">/// edge to B is reachable without going through the nearest common</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="comment">/// post-dominator of B and all uses of the def.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="comment">/// TODO: This rule is conservative because it does not check whether the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="comment">///       relevant branches are actually divergent.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The class is designed to cache the CFG traversal so that it can be re-used</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><Highlight kind="comment">/// for multiple defs within the same basic block.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><Highlight kind="comment">/// TODO: We could use region analysis to quickly skip over SESE regions during</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><Highlight kind="comment">///       the traversal.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-siloweri1copies-cpp-/loopfinder"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-siloweri1copies-cpp-/loopfinder/#ad5b0bdd3a466adacd81540baaa80f08d">LoopFinder</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinedominatortree">MachineDominatorTree</a> &amp;DT;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinepostdominatortree">MachinePostDominatorTree</a> &amp;PDT;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// All visited / reachable block, tagged by level (level 0 is the def block,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// level 1 are all blocks reachable including but not going through the def</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// block&#39;s IPDOM, etc.).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;MachineBasicBlock &#42;, unsigned&gt;</a> Visited;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Nearest common dominator of all visited blocks by level (level 0 is the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// def block). Used for seeding the SSAUpdater.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;MachineBasicBlock &#42;, 4&gt;</a> CommonDominators;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Post-dominator of all visited blocks.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;VisitedPostDom = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Level at which a loop was found: 0 is not possible; 1 = a backward edge is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// reachable without going through the IPDOM of the def block (if the IPDOM</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// itself has an edge to the def block, the loop level is 2), etc.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FoundLoopLevel = ~0u;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;DefBlock = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;MachineBasicBlock &#42;, 4&gt;</a> Stack;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;MachineBasicBlock &#42;, 4&gt;</a> NextLevel;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-siloweri1copies-cpp-/loopfinder/#ad5b0bdd3a466adacd81540baaa80f08d"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-siloweri1copies-cpp-/loopfinder/#ad5b0bdd3a466adacd81540baaa80f08d">LoopFinder</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinedominatortree">MachineDominatorTree</a> &amp;DT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinepostdominatortree">MachinePostDominatorTree</a> &amp;PDT)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><Highlight kind="normal">      : DT(DT), PDT(PDT) &#123;&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> advanceLevel() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><Highlight kind="normal">    MachineBasicBlock &#42;VisitedDom;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!VisitedPostDom) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><Highlight kind="normal">      VisitedPostDom = DefBlock;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><Highlight kind="normal">      VisitedDom = DefBlock;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><Highlight kind="normal">      Stack.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a3b1dce1f3354a357fb9061bb7568a84e">push&#95;back</a>(DefBlock);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><Highlight kind="normal">      VisitedPostDom = PDT.getNode(VisitedPostDom)-&gt;getIDom()-&gt;getBlock();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><Highlight kind="normal">      VisitedDom = CommonDominators.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#acf35424231192c6b4a3e22d711f50b1e">back</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0; i &lt; NextLevel.size();) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (PDT.dominates(VisitedPostDom, NextLevel&#91;i&#93;)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><Highlight kind="normal">          Stack.push&#95;back(NextLevel&#91;i&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><Highlight kind="normal">          NextLevel&#91;i&#93; = NextLevel.back();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><Highlight kind="normal">          NextLevel.pop&#95;back();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><Highlight kind="normal">          i++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Stack.empty()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!PDT.dominates(VisitedPostDom, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><Highlight kind="normal">        NextLevel.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a3b1dce1f3354a357fb9061bb7568a84e">push&#95;back</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MachineBasicBlock &#42;Succ : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ad88ff1529541fb4e243cc8ed90b11131">successors</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="856"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="857"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Lower all instructions that def or use vreg&#95;1 registers.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="858"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="859"><Highlight kind="comment">/// In a first pass, we lower COPYs from vreg&#95;1 to vector registers, as can</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="860"><Highlight kind="comment">/// occur around inline assembly. We do this first, before vreg&#95;1 registers</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="861"><Highlight kind="comment">/// are changed to scalar mask registers.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="862"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="863"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Then we lower all defs of vreg&#95;1 registers. Phi nodes are lowered before</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="864"><Highlight kind="comment">/// all others, because phi lowering looks through copies and can therefore</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="865"><Highlight kind="comment">/// often make copy lowering unnecessary.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="866" lineLink="#a7cf6d1c87b479dd800293a9194aaff9a"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#a7cf6d1c87b479dd800293a9194aaff9a">runFixI1Copies</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp;MF, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinedominatortree">MachineDominatorTree</a> &amp;MDT,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="867"><Highlight kind="normal">                           <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinepostdominatortree">MachinePostDominatorTree</a> &amp;MPDT) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="868"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Only need to run this in SelectionDAG path.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="869"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#ac1f888bba00f32cb4f9a0010c958f397">getProperties</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunctionproperties/#aacef05f16d3e71703f08bb4677e1d7a2">hasProperty</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="870"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunctionproperties/#ad85237c6c667e4713efe8921e9c32ac1a91b442d385b54e1418d81adc34871053">MachineFunctionProperties::Property::Selected</a>))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="871"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="872"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
